title: ISic001670. A Punic abecedarium
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]wzḥṭyklmnsʾpṣqršt[---]
[---]lzyṣnqṭʾq[---]
[---]bqtq[---]   ←

Apparatus criticus

Text of De Simone 2013 (Minima epigraphica punica)

translation

commentary

Although line one is securely identified as an alphabetic sequence, the overall nature and function of the text remains very uncertain. The intepretation of lines 2 and 3 (in a seemingly different hand from line 1) is unclear, and the fact that the stone was clearly prepared and the text is carefully engraved makes it difficult to establish the overall intention.

bibliography

  • De Simone 2010 51 no.12 ph https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002543
  • De Simone 2013 33 SEL.2 fig.24 and pp.47-50 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002545
  • De Simone 2013 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002547
  • De Simone 2010 185-186 fig.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002546
